name: lib-for-node10-wrapped-php7-lambda-layer
description: This is a simple [Lambda Layer](https://docs.aws.amazon.com/lambda/latest/dg/configuration-layers.html#configuration-layers-manage) for PHP7 apps that use Node10 as a wrapper. It is published in our `nypl-digital-dev` AWS account as [lib-for-node10-wrapped-php7](https://console.aws.amazon.com/lambda/home?region=us-east-1#/layers/lib-for-node10-wrapped-php7/versions/1).
